TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Wait, you already had a wish at having you posts moderated. Granted.

I'd like if for at least one hour all posts here would not require moderation.

Granted but after that hour its @99999888484847574 times worse

i wish for xannari fellows

Granted. (You also get me!) That's some scary stuff.

I wish fishing line wasn't so sharp. Freakin' finger lacerations and all... such a pain...

Granted, instead, its thick enough where the fish can see it from so far away that they know when you are loading your truck to go fishing.

I wish for a tank.

Somehow i could be dislexic sometime so you only get a "thanks" but feel free to try to remove the letters you don't need and see if it work ; )

I wish access to a few or all of my own 'white house' files are not granted to only certain person i have in mind and that this is false.

Edited April 29, 2015 by WinkAllKerb''

Granted. Obama stares at you in anger.

I wish for Tank

______.....__

/..........\ /...o|

\u------u------/

Granted. It is about to shoot you with a 152mm Derp gun!

i wish for a friendly KV-2

Granted. It tries to hang out at your house to play video games, but ends up crushing your computer.

I wish for a real life object made out of ASCII.

Granted, but it falls apart as soon as you get it.

I wish for an Mi-35 Hind

Granted. You are killed by the russians piloting it with their machine gun.

I wish for my homework to be finished.

Granted. It's finished... only...

I wish I wasn't full. I want food, but I'll explode if I eat it.

Granted, your stomach was damaged beyond repair in an [insert adjective] [insert noun] accident and had to be amputated.

I wish that my computer had infinite processing speeds.

Granted. The amount of information that it's transmitting to your monitor results in an explosion of electricity.

I wish for an explosion of electricity.
Granted. A new breakthrough in natural energy research reveals it is possible to get gigawatts of power through geo-harmonic exploitation.

Granted. You no longer can wish for you do not wish. Wait, what?... *muttering in background* Oh... he didn't wish so I just wish for myself? *muttering* And me repeating everything your saying is just annoying? *muttering* Okay, so I should stop talking?

I wish for a successful Eve and back mission in 1.0!

The mission succeeds spectacularly, except for that fact that you forgot to put Kerbals in it before you launched. You never said it had to be manned..

I wish for a sandwich.

Granted. It's full of mould and this is not related to the included Camembert.

I wish for a shiny, new, fully functional, usable and non-lethal BlackBerry Passport.

Granted. It is mistaken for your non-blackberry passport and you now suffer legal consequences.

I wish for Jebediah to be flame-proof.

Granted. The game it no longer fun.

I wish for a copy of Final Fantasy VI. I NEED IT!

Granted. you don't have a product key and it doesn't work.

i wish for a adamantium bunker (with some way to get in/out)

Granted a nuke hits it derectly but that doesn't kill you you are stuck inside the bunker for 7 years because of rubble and radiation so you take a plastic bag an -------------------

i wish wish for depleted uranium dust in a lead box

Done, but the depleted uranium weighs millions of tons inside the box, causing it to fall straight down through the floor rendering it unretrivable

I wish for the ability to dock ingame.

Granted. The player base is split apart by the ability to combine multiple fuel tanks while in space.

I wish for the ability to dock in other games.

Granted. Since the connection is 2 way, I slam my cargo ship into it at 29km/s.

I wish I had some ideas. I'm super bored right now.

Granted, you are now driven by a ludicrous dream to conquer Europe, including Russia, in winter.

I wish for a quick and easy method to terraform other planets in out solar system.
